description: Object containing information about employment related expenses in the retrieved tax calculation.

totalEmploymentExpenses.description: Total employment expenses. This value must be between 0 and 99999999999.99 up to 2 decimal places.

businessTravelCosts.description: Total business travel costs. This value must be between 0 and 99999999999.99 up to 2 decimal places.

jobExpenses.description: Total job expenses. This value must be between 0 and 99999999999.99 up to 2 decimal places.

flatRateJobExpenses.description: Total flat rate job expenses. This value must be between 0 and 99999999999.99 up to 2 decimal places.

professionalSubscriptions.description: Total professional subscriptions. This value must be between 0 and 99999999999.99 up to 2 decimal places.

hotelAndMealExpenses.description: Total hotel and meal expenses. This value must be between 0 and 99999999999.99 up to 2 decimal places.

otherAndCapitalAllowances.description: Total other and capital allowances. This value must be between 0 and 99999999999.99 up to 2 decimal places.

vehicleExpenses.description: Total vehicle expenses. This value must be between 0 and 99999999999.99 up to 2 decimal places.

mileageAllowanceRelief.description: Total Mileage Allowance Relief. This value must be between 0 and 99999999999.99 up to 2 decimal places.
